channel.title: Adding/Changing NPC option
channel.description:
Hey, just wondering how to change npc options. I have NPC with the following options; Talk to, get Recommendation, and trade. I want to options to read; Talk to, Teleport, and trade. How do I change get Recommendation to Teleport. I feel like it's easy and i just can't figure out.
Server = 718 Matrix
PREESH
